note.p: Birth: Utrecht, Holland (11 February or 21 April 1684)

Career: Tutor to the son of Baron van Welderen; Second Secretary to the Dutch Embassy in England (1715); founded 'Le Misanthrope', a journal inspired by the 'Spectator'; founded the 'Journal litteraire de La Haye' with Willem Jakob 's Gravesande (FRS 1715); travelled to Sweden with the Prince of Hesse-Philippsthal (1719); Tutor to the son of Jacob van Huisman (1721); Secretary to the Dutch Embassy to England (1727); Inspecteur des Magasins at 's Hertogenbosch (1727-death); Editor of the 'Hollandsche Spectator' (1731-1735)
Notes: Possible birth date of 21 April 1684. Proposed by Brook Taylor
